mapper.insert:
insert into detect_staff_info_copy t
t.birthday,
t.contact,
t.edu_degree,
t.gender,
t.grade_gain_date,
t.grade_id,
t.id_card_no,
t.is_delete,
t.name,
t.operator,
t.position_id,
t.qualification_audit_date,
t.qualification_gain_date,
t.qualification_grade,
t.qualification_invalid_date,
t.qualification_valid_time,
t.remark,
t.status,
t.tec_category,
t.workarea_id,
t.create_time
values
#{birthday},
#{contact},
#{eduDegree},
#{gender},
#{gradeGainDate},
#{gradeId},
#{idCardNo},
#{isDelete},
#{name},
#{operator},
#{positionId},
#{qualificationAuditDate},
#{qualificationGainDate},
#{qualificationGrade},
#{qualificationInvalidDate},
#{qualificationValidTime},
#{remark},
#{status},
#{tecCategory},
#{workareaId},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update detect_staff_info_copy t
t.birthday = #{Birthday},
t.contact = #{Contact},
t.edu_degree = #{EduDegree},
t.gender = #{Gender},
t.grade_gain_date = #{GradeGainDate},
t.grade_id = #{GradeId},
t.id_card_no = #{IdCardNo},
t.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
t.name = #{Name},
t.operator = #{Operator},
t.position_id = #{PositionId},
t.qualification_audit_date = #{QualificationAuditDate},
t.qualification_gain_date = #{QualificationGainDate},
t.qualification_grade = #{QualificationGrade},
t.qualification_invalid_date = #{QualificationInvalidDate},
t.qualification_valid_time = #{QualificationValidTime},
t.remark = #{Remark},
t.status = #{Status},
t.tec_category = #{TecCategory},
t.workarea_id = #{WorkareaId}
t.update_time= current_timestamp
t.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select t.birthday, t.contact, t.create_time, t.edu_degree, t.gender, t.grade_gain_date, t.grade_id, t.id, t.id_card_no, t.is_delete, t.name, t.operator, t.position_id, t.qualification_audit_date, t.qualification_gain_date, t.qualification_grade, t.qualification_invalid_date, t.qualification_valid_time, t.remark, t.status, t.tec_category, t.update_time, t.workarea_id form detect_staff_info_copy t
t.id = #{id}
